mapper.sql: ordr_num, sub_nm, sub_id, whs_encd, invty_cls_encd, measr_corp_nm, spc_model, invty_cd, invty_nm, bat_num, invty_encd, qty, uprc, amt, make_vouch_id, make_vouch_abst, send_unit_price, send_qty, send_moeny, in_unit_price, in_qty, in_moeny, oth_unit_price, oth_moeny, oth_qty, acct_yr, accti_mth, acc_num, acc_time, ctime, is_final_deal, is_mth_end_stl

mapper.update:
update invty_send_mth_term_bgn_tab
qty = #{qty},
amt = #{amt},
uprc = #{uprc},
is_final_deal = #{isFinalDeal},
acc_num = #{accNum},

in_qty = #{inQty},
in_moeny = #{inMoeny},
oth_unit_price = #{othUnitPrice},
oth_moeny = #{othMoeny},

where ordr_num = #{ordrNum}
mapper.insert:
insert into invty_send_mth_term_bgn_tab (sub_nm, sub_id,whs_encd, invty_cls_encd, measr_corp_nm, spc_model, invty_cd, invty_nm,bat_num, invty_encd, qty,uprc, amt, make_vouch_id,make_vouch_abst, send_unit_price,send_qty,send_moeny, in_unit_price, in_qty,in_moeny, oth_unit_price, oth_moeny, oth_qty, acct_yr, accti_mth,acc_num, acc_time,ctime,is_final_deal, is_mth_end_stl,cust_id) VALUES
